title: Smartphone theft at Central Mall
description: My iPhone was stolen while I was shopping at Central Mall. I left it on a table at the food court for a moment, and when I returned it was gone.

title: Vandalism at City Park
description: Several benches and trash cans were vandalized with spray paint at City Park. The graffiti appears to be gang-related symbols.

title: Assault outside Downtown Bar
description: I was assaulted by a group of three men while leaving Downtown Bar. They took my wallet and watch. One of them had a distinctive tattoo on his neck.

title: Home burglary on Oak Street
description: My home was broken into while I was away on vacation. The back door was forced open, and several valuable items were stolen including electronics and jewelry.

title: Credit card fraud
description: I noticed several unauthorized transactions on my credit card statement. The charges were made at various online retailers.
